operations.notes:
Creates a new Resource. Resources represent real-world locations, objects, and services that may be Reserved by Users. This is only used for creating a NEW resource for an account.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

Rights Required Comment
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES CONDITIONAL Required to create a resource in a ResourceGroup to which the user has MANAGE allocations.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES_NON_ALLOC CONDITIONAL Required to create this resource without having MANAGE allocations to the resource groups to which this resource is being added.

Note: Rooms can only be created in a Venue that is owned by the HomeAccount.

This operation requires a Input value. The CreateResourceInput has the following fields:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
resource Resource Data REQUIRED The resource to be created.
resourceGroups List of Numeric REQUIRED A list of System IDs identifying existing Resource Groups to which this resource is to be assigned.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Resource

In the case that the provided resource data value cannot be processed into a Resource within the system, the following exceptions will be returned:

  • Resource Exception if there are errors within the data provided to create the Resource.
  • Duplicate Identity Exception if an identity within the Resource Data value is a duplicate of a pre-existing identity.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Modifed Resource Data value to update.
parameters.name: _resource

operations.notes:
Updates an existing resource. Resources represent real-world locations, objects, and services that may be Reserved by Users.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

Rights Required Comment
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES CONDITIONAL Required to update this resource in a ResourceGroup to which the user has MANAGE allocations.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES_NON_ALLOC CONDITIONAL Required to update this resource in a ResourceGroup to which the user does not have MANAGE allocations.

Note: Rooms can only be created in a Venue that is owned by the HomeAccount.

This operation returns a Resource Data value representing the updated Resource.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Not Found

If the Resource identified by the Sysid in the submitted Resource cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the original Resource cannot be found using the given System ID.

Invalid Resource

In the case that the provided resource data value cannot be processed into a Resource within the system, the following exceptions will be returned:

  • Resource Exception if there are errors within the data provided to create the Resource.
  • Duplicate Identity Exception if an identity within the Resource Data value is a duplicate of a pre-existing identity.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Provides a list of SYSID values indicating the relationship that the identified User has with the identified Resource.

This operation requires a Allocation Relationship Wrapper object with the following attributes:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
sysidUser Number REQUIRED Integer unique SYSID of the User for whom the Allocation Relationships are defined.
sysidResource Number REQUIRED Integer unique SYSID of the Resource whose Allocation Relationships are being queried.

This operation returns a Allocation Relationship Wrapper object with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
sysidUser Number Integer unique SYSID of the User for whom the Allocation Relationships are defined.
sysidResource Number Integer unique SYSID of the Resource whose Allocation Relationships are being queried.
allocationRelationships List of type Number Integer array of all SYSID Allocation Relationships which apply to the User and Resource. See Allocation Relationship Type.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Integer ID of the resource category for which we are retrieving custom attributes.
parameters.name: categoryId

operations.notes:
Retrieves the custom resource attribute data defined for a particular Resource Category as identified by the category ID path parameter.

For more information, see Resource Attribute.

This operation returns a Resource Attribute Type Data Wrapper with the following fields:

NameData TypeDescription
resourceAttributeTypes Array of Resource Attribute values. List of all Resource Attributes data types associated with the Resource Category.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This method retrieves all Resource Categories defined in the Agilquest.com system associated with the parent account of the authenticated application token. A Resource Category is used to describe whether the resource belonging to the category can have child resources, can be a child resource, can be a top level resource, allows multi-day reservation of the resource, or has room capacity.

See Resource Category for more information.

This operation returns a Resource Category Wrapper value with the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
categories Array of Resource Category values The Resource Categories associated with the application.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : IdentityLookup data structure containing the numeric sysidResourceIdentityType and the String identityValue
parameters.name: _identity

operations.notes:
Locate and return a Resource using the Resource Identity lookup information provided.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

Rights Required
If the resource is not publicly viewable, the resource needs to be in one of the requestor's allocations. ALWAYS

This operation requires an Identity Lookup argument. The request has the following fields:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
sysidResourceIdentityType Integer System ID of Resource Identity Type REQUIRED ID of the Resource Identity Type associated with the desired Resource Data value.
identityValue String Identity Value REQUIRED Unique Identity Value of the Resource Identity to use to find the desired Resource Data value.

This operation returns a Resource Data value.

Resource Identities

Resource Identities provide another means for identifying room resources. Each Resource Identity is associated with a Resource Identity Type. A Resource Identity Type is uniquely defined per account, and has an ID, name, and description. An example of a resource identity type would be a MAC Address, which could be used to identify a room by MAC address. When searching for a resource using a Resource Identity, the sysidResourceIdentityType and identityValue values must express the numeric ID of the Resource Identity Type and the String Identity Value respectively.

For example, assuming a MAC Address Resource Identity Type has a System ID value of 1, and a room resource has an Identity Value of ROOM446, the identity lookup value for finding the room resource would look as follows:

{ sysidResourceIdentityType=1, identityValue="ROOM446" }

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the user is not authenticated or does not have the required permissions to perform the operation, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Not Found

If a Resource matching the Resource Identity cannot be found, the following error is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if no Resources were found for the given Resource System ID.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation gets the list of Permissions that the currently logged in user has for the identified Resource. The Permissions are identified by their SYSID_AllocationRelationshipType value.

See Allocation Relationship for more information.

This operation returns a Resource Permissions Response with the following attributes:

NameData TypeDescription
sysidResource Integer Unique SYSID of the Resource for which the permissions are defined for the currently authenticated User.
permissions List of Integer values List of SYSID Allocation Relationships that the authenticated User has with the identified Resource.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Not Found

If a matching Resource cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Resource is not found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: Must be called after resources are imported

operations.summary: Get Resource Types by Resource Category.
operations.notes:
Returns a list of Resource Type values associated with the resource category ID.

A Resource Type describes a sub type of resource within a Resource Category. E.g., for a Conference Room Resource Category, there may be three types of resources - Small, Medium, and Large conference rooms.

This operation returns a Resource Type Data Wrapper with the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
resourceTypes Array of Resource Type values The Resource Types associated with the application.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Integer ID of the resource to retrieve
parameters.name: resourceId

operations.notes:
Retrieve the resource identified by the numeric resource ID value passed as a path parameter. Resources represent real-world locations, objects, and services that may be Reserved by Users.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

Rights Required
If the resource is not publicly viewable, the resource needs to be in one of the requestor's allocations. ALWAYS

This operation returns a Resource Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the user is not authenticated or does not have the required permissions to perform the operation, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Not Found

If a Resource with a matching System ID cannot be found, the following error is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if no Resources were found for the given Resource System ID.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Integer ID of the resource to delete.
parameters.name: resourceId

operations.notes:
Delete the resource identified by the given Resource Sysid path parameter value. The Resource cannot be delted if there are any active or pending reservations.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

Rights Required Comment
AuthRuleType.DELETE_RESOURCES ALWAYS
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES CONDITIONAL Required to delete this resource from a ResourceGroup to which the user has MANAGE allocations.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES_NON_ALLOC CONDITIONAL Required to delete this resource from a ResourceGroup to which the user does not have MANAGE allocations.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Not Found

If the Resource identified by the Sysid in the submitted Resource cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the original Resource cannot be found using the given System ID.

Invalid Resource

In the case that the identified resource is associated with an active Reservation, or cannot be deleted, the following exception is returned:

  • Resource Exception if the Resource cannot be deleted.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Integer ID of the Resource to update with an image
parameters.name: resourceId

parameters.description: : {@link MultipartFormDataInput} value with the image file information
parameters.name: _input

operations.notes:
Uploads an Image file for the Resource identified by System ID. Images are interpreted into Resource Image values. A valid image may be a PNG, JPG, TIFF, BMP or other valid image format.

The requesting user must have the following rights for this operation:

Rights Required Comment
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES CONDITIONAL Required to update this resource from a ResourceGroup to which the user has MANAGE allocations.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES_NON_ALLOC CONDITIONAL Required to update this resource from a ResourceGroup to which the user does not have MANAGE allocations.

Note: The user must either be the SystemAdmin, or the user's HomeAccount must match the SYSID_Account of the Resource.

This operation requires an application/octet-stream HTTP attachment with appropriate Content-Disposition headers.

This operation returns a Resource Image value with the URL of the image hosted within the AgilQuest CDN.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Not Found

If the Resource with a matching System ID is not found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Resource cannot be found.

Invalid Resource Image

If the provided file is not a valid image file, or the image name is a duplicate of an existing resource image, the following exception is returned:

Required Data Exception if the image file is not valid.

Resource Exception if the name of the image is not unique for the resource.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Integer System ID of the Resource
parameters.name: resourceId

parameters.description: : Integer System ID of the Resource Image to return for the associated resource
parameters.name: imageId

operations.notes:
Retrieve the identified Resource Image based on the given Resource System ID and Resource Image System ID.

This operation returns a Resource Image value.

Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

If the Resource with a matching System ID is not found, or the matching Resource Image cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

operations.notes:
Add a Locator to the resource that will be used to display the location of the resource over the map image associated with the provided Map Image Locator Data.

This operation requires a Map Image Locator Data value.

This operation returns a Map Image Locator Data Wrapper value with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
locators List of Map Image Locator Data values. All Map image locator data values belonging to the Resource, including the created locator.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Not Found

If a Resource with a matching System ID cannot be found, or the resource is not an Exhaustible Resource, the following error is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if no Resources were found for the given Resource System ID.

Resource Exception

If the Map Image Locator Data is invalid, then the following exception is returned:

  • Resource Exception if the data for the resource is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
